### Shadow sizes

```{r}
library(htmltools)

div(
  div(
    .style %>%
      margin(2) %>%
      shadow("small"),  # <-
    "Small"
  ),
  div(
    .style %>%
      margin(2) %>%
      shadow("medium"),  # <-
    "Medium"
  ),
  div(
    .style %>%
      margin(2) %>%
      shadow("large"),  # <-
    "Large"
  )
)
```
